roleset.name: to gain a tactical advantage over

example.name: transitive
example.text: Earlier this month , Convex made a bid [*] to outflank other supercomputer competitors like Digital Equipment Corp. and International Business Machines Corp. by [*-3]adopting an open set of standards and introducing new hardware and software [0] [*T*-2] to link different systems .
example.arg: other supercomputer competitors like Digital Equipment Corp. and International Business Machines Corp.
by [*-3]adopting an open set of standards and introducing new hardware and software

roleset.note: OUTFLANK-V NOTES: Frames file for 'outflank' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from outflank.01-v predicate notes)
